title: How to Make Strawberry Soother

steps.headline: Pour the boiling water over the teabags in a small mixing bowl.
Add the pineapple wedges and strawberries.
Serve.
steps.description: Pour the drink into a jug and add ice cubes. Provide glasses and let people help themselves.

text: Pour the boiling water over the teabags in a small mixing bowl.  Leave to brew for 2–3 minutes.  Remove the teabags. Pour in the cold water. Add the pineapple wedges and strawberries. Stir through. Serve. Pour the drink into a jug and add ice cubes. Provide glasses and let people help themselves. Finished.
